p: Motility assay was performed in 3 parallels as described earlier [ 15, 35]. One μl of the OD 600=0.6 culture of C. jejuni NCTC 11168 was added to the middle of 0.3% BHI agar plates (20 mL) lacking or containing PEO (150 μg/mL or 50 μg/mL) with a standard 1 μl loop (Sarstedt, Germany). Diameters (mm) of the spreading zones were determined after 24 h incubation at 37°C under microaerobic conditions.
